Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy of SCI-T Platform

Effective Date: 25/11/2024

1. Information We Collect

We collect information to provide, improve, and personalize our services. This includes:

1.1 Personal Information

  • Name, email address, phone number, and profile picture.
  • Academic and professional information such as study programs, research interests, and affiliations.

1.2 Project-Related Information

  • Details of projects you create or participate in, including reports, deliverables, and contributions.
  • Activity logs associated with collaboration and point accumulation.

1.3 Usage Data

  • Information on how you interact with our platform, including pages visited, time spent, and other analytics.
  • Device information such as browser type, IP address, and operating system.

1.4 Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and similar tools to enhance user experience and analyze site performance.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information for the following purposes:

  • To create and manage your user account.
  • To display your name, profile picture, and brief description in publicly visible project directories.
  • To facilitate project management, point systems, and collaboration.
  • To communicate updates, new features, or notifications related to the platform.
  • To analyze and enhance the platform's performance and user experience.
  • To comply with legal obligations and enforce our policies.

3. Sharing and Disclosure of Information

We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. However, we may share it in the following circumstances:

3.1 Public Information

Your profile and project participation details (name, description, and follow button) are publicly accessible.

3.2 Project Visibility

  • For open science projects, reports and final deliverables will be published on our platform.
  • Private projects will remain confidential, and no reports or deliverables will be shared publicly.

3.3 Service Providers

We may share your information with trusted service providers to perform functions on our behalf, such as data storage or analytics.

3.4 Legal Obligations

We may disclose your information as required by law, regulation, or legal process.

4. Data Retention

We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy or as required by law. Upon request, we will delete or anonymize your data unless retention is required by legal obligations.

5. Your Rights and Choices

As a SCI-T user, you have the following rights:

  • Access and review the information we have about you.
  • Update or correct your personal information.
  • Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal and contractual obligations.
  • Opt out of receiving non-essential communications.

To exercise these rights, contact us at sciti.ceo@gmail.com

6. Security Measures

We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure.

7. Third-Party Links

Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies before providing personal information.

8. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly.

9. Contact Us

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, contact us at:

Email: sciti.ceo@gmail.com
